headline: March sunshine in the UK - in pictures
text: A woman exercises in the sunshine on Primrose Hill in London Photograph: Dan Kitwood/Getty Images       A punt makes its way along the river Cam in the spring sunshine in Cambridge Photograph: Chris Radburn/PA       A dog runs past spring flowers starting to bloom on the Stray in Harrogate, North Yorkshire Photograph: Jonathan Pow/PA       Tourists enjoy donkey rides on Filey beach, North Yorkshire Photograph: Dan Kitwood/Getty Images       A bee pollinates a Jacqueline Postill evergreen shrub at BlueBell arboretum in Smisby, Ashby de la Zouch, Leicestershire Photograph: Rui Vieira/PA       Crocuses bloom in the spring sunshine along the Backs in Cambridge Photograph: Chris Radburn/PA       A daffodil with snowdrops in the background Photograph: Rui Vieira/PA       Trentham gardens in Stoke Photograph: Rui Vieira/PA       Crocuses in Kew gardens, London Photograph: Dan Kitwood/Getty Images       A couple soak up the sun on the beach at Weston-super-Mare in Somerset Photograph: Ben Birchall/PA       Walkers and dogs take to the beach at Weston-super-Mare in Somerset Photograph: Ben Birchall/PA       A man relaxes on a bench in the mid-morning sun by Clifton suspension bridge in Bristol Photograph: Ben Birchall/PA       Spring flowers bloom inside the Norman Foster-designed Great Glasshouse at the National Botanic Garden of Wales near Carmarthen Photograph: Matt Cardy/Getty Images       Daffodils grow in front of the Norman Foster-designed Great Glasshouse at the National Botanic Garden of Wales Photograph: Matt Cardy/Getty Images
